tidbits.title: Mediterranean Gem
tidbits.description: Malta is a Mediterranean gem known for its historic sites, stunning coastline, and a blend of influences from various civilizations.

tidbits.title: Rich History
tidbits.description: The country boasts a rich history, with megalithic temples, medieval towns, and the fortified city of Valletta, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

tidbits.title: Diverse Culture
tidbits.description: Malta's culture is diverse, influenced by Phoenician, Roman, Arab, and British legacies, reflected in its language, cuisine, and traditions.
